code: import _toConsumableArray from"C:/Users/Sanjay Sharan Maurya/Desktop/bestcart/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray.js";import{ADD_CART_RED,DELETE_CART_RED,GET_CART_RED,UPDATE_CART_RED}from"../Constants";export function CartReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var newState,index;switch(action.type){case ADD_CART_RED:newState=_toConsumableArray(state);newState.push(action.payload);return newState;case GET_CART_RED:return action.payload;case UPDATE_CART_RED:newState=_toConsumableArray(state);index=newState.findIndex(function(x){return x.id===Number(action.payload.id);});newState[index].name=action.payload.name;return newState;case DELETE_CART_RED:newState=_toConsumableArray(state);index=newState.find(function(x){return x.id===action.payload.id;});newState.splice(index,1);return newState;default:return state;}}
